column10: The bike and pedestrian lane is blocked, including access to the pedestrian crossing signal, but there is no detour and no safe way for cyclists and pedestrians to pass without stepping onto 123, which is particularly dangerous for southbound users who will have to ride/walk in the breakdown lane. Savvy users will know to deviate to the Workhouse Way, but that's not clear.
